answers.answer: I'm sorry that I can't be too helpful with this question, as a woman and the mom of a teenage girl with diabetes. Is there someone else on the forum who knows anything about this?All I can say is that you should check with both your doctor and pharmacist about this. You are on a lot of medications, so it seems logical that the problem might come from that.Good luck to you in figuring this problem out.

question: I've had diabetes for the past 29 years.  I am currently on a pump.  I have ED due to the neuropathy and the med's.  When I ejaculate a have a sharp pain that starts at the base of my penis and goes straight out from there left and right about 6". could this be caused by the med's that I am taking (cozaar, wellbutrin, effexor, aspirin, lamictal and lisenipril) or is it from the Diabetes? I do not have an erection but I can still ejaculate with stimulation.  The pain goes away in about 5 min.
title: Painful ejaculation
